When those who had been misused and deprived of their just dues were advised to pass the sponge over the account, it was for them to say they would do it. It was for them to say they would forgive the wrong done them, leaving the matter with the Lord. It was not 


                              -152- 

left for those in authority to take the sponge and erase the figures. I was shown that this also was a test which would reveal hearts.
